snippet.title: Escape Doodland Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/670930/Escape_Doodland/
and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/escape-doodland-switch

More:
https://www.facebook.com/EscapeDoodland/
https://twitter.com/veronicgrk
https://www.instagram.com/appsidedown/
http://escapedoodland.com

Death and destruction came into Doodland. This happy and joyful land is going to change. Forever.
There are only two options: run as fast as you can or die.
